content: *berroco yarns for this pattern have been discontinued directions are still available * *val is a handbag crocheted in 3 shades of suede we fastened it with a metal latch that we found at the local hardware store but any button or buckle would work berroco * skill level intermediate materials berroco suede 50 grs 3 balls #3789 nelly belle a 2 balls #3769 sundance kid b and 3 balls #3715 tonto c crochet hook size 2mm b or size to obtain gauge brass bag closure tapestry needle pattern 1-row repeat front and back are worked vertically
